issues.description: The template declares PersonService.save(Person) as private, but other classes (PersonResource and tests) call personService.save(...). This is a visibility mismatch that will cause compilation errors and block students from running or testing the project. The solution repository shows save(...) as public, indicating the intended visibility is public.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the visibility of PersonService.save(Person) in the template from private to public (matching the solution). This allows controllers and tests to call personService.save(...) as intended and prevents compile errors. Concretely, update the method declaration to 'public Person save(Person person) { ... }'.
